name: Elcoment Rhodamine P-L
description: Elcoment Rhodamine P-L belong to ChromaScape's full line of pigment dispersions formulated with a range of dispersants. Dispersant choice is critical for the intended end-use application. We offer organic, inorganic, synthetic and basic dyes. Our pigment lines are intended for laminate base papers, parchment papers, museum boards, high-quality printing papers, tinting whites and various non-woven applications.
